title: La Liga round-up: Villarreal held by Deportivo La Coruna
description: Villarreal were denied the chance to move up to fifth in La Liga after being held to a 1-1 draw by Deportivo La Coruna on Sunday.
content: Enes Unal's 30th-minute strike appeared to be sending Villarreal above Sevilla in the table, but Florin Andone struck for Deportivo six minutes from time.Athletic Bilbao climbed to eighth with a 2-0 win over Alaves, who stay in the relegation zone. Xabier Etxeita opened the scoring after eight minutes for Bilbao, and Aritz Aduriz sealed the win with a second-half penalty.Gabriel Pires scored a second-half winner as Leganes secured a 1-0 victory over Real Sociedad. Pires struck from a Javier Eraso free-kick with 15 minutes remaining to secure all three points for the hosts at the Municipal de Butarque Stadium.
